title: wtf riot
body: okay so im writing this while trying to reconnect to game of aram but it says that i cant connect couse i have no internet connection and im trying to reonnect 10 minutes now as you can see i have internet connection couse im now writing this so its problem on your end pls dont give me a ban couse i didnt do anything wrong i have connection it disconected me from game and idk y and i was playing with my friend on skype it disconected me and him from the game idk wtf is going on

replies.body:
Your own home internet can be in pristine condition but it can still have issues here and there getting a solid connection to specific servers. It sounds like this is case here since you're still able to use skype and post on our boards while trying to reconnect. 

We can cover the most common causes with the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if you still can't stay connected to those games. Be sure to test these changes in a custom game, that way you can avoid any leaverbusters.
